Info.Title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
Info.Actors: Jeff Goldblum, Julianne Moore, Pete Postlethwaite, Arliss Howard
Info.Plot: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.
Info.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 27 nominations.
